articles.author: Gabriel Gavin, Elena Giordano, Hans von der Burchard
articles.title: Zelenskyy enlists top EU leaders for Trump talks in DC - politico.eu
articles.description: European Commission’s von der Leyen, Germany’s Merz, France’s Macron among those joining the delegation to the White House.
articles.content: “At the request of President Zelenskyy, I will join the meeting with President Trump and other European leaders in the White House tomorrow,” von der Leyen said in a statement, prior to receiving the… [+1447 chars]
